DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy TAK-385 40 mg administer orally daily 12 week , compare placebo participant pain symptom associate uterine fibroid .
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled , Phase 3 Study TAK-385 40 mg Treatment Pain Symptoms Associated With Uterine Fibroids
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 3 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group study evaluate efficacy TAK-385 40 mg administer orally daily 12 week compare placebo participant pain symptom associate uterine fibroid . Participants must diagnose uterine fibroid confirm transvaginal ultrasound method . Participants must experience pain symptom associate uterine fibroid ( eg , low abdominal pain low back pain ) . The total number participant randomize double-blind condition 64 ( 32 participant TAK-385 40 mg group placebo group ) .

The participant sign date write , informed consent form prior initiation study procedure . 3 . Prior VISIT 1 , participant diagnosis uterine fibroid confirm transvaginal ultrasound , abdominal ultrasound , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , compute tomography ( CT ) , laparoscopy , never receive surgical treatment myoma ( measurable noncalcified myoma long diameter ≥3 cm ) . 4 .
